name: Plague (AlexY12)
description:
Plague is a prototype game made using the Unreal 5 engine. 

Plague takes place in Medieval England where you play as a plague doctor that is tasked with curing a town of the bubonic plague. As this doctor, you must go from door to door in a rural village, curing the residents of their afflictions, but be warned, some doors don’t want to be opened. Make your way into these residents’ homes by prying the door open, picking the lock of the door.
